divs: Sighting DetailsThe city was hectic due to two window cleaners hanging off a falling scafold on 57th Street and 8th avenue. I was walking towards Port Auth on 8th avenue and 42nd street when a couple of ambulances rushed pass me and I looked up towards the East when I saw this object hovering towards the right side of the Chrysler building. Helicopters and a plane passed by it. The more I looked at it, the more I realized I had no idea what I was looking at. I was able to take a picture and as soon as it did it vanished. I took the picture with my iphone 5, I know it's not the best picture but I was happy to take it.
Summary: It didn't look like anything i've seen
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around June 12th 2013
